types.name: BS5837:2012 Tree Survey
types.description: Comprehensive tree survey report compliant with BS5837:2012 standards.

types.name: Arboricultural Impact Assessment (AIA)
types.description: Assessment of potential impacts of proposed development on existing trees.

types.name: Arboricultural Method Statement (AMS)
types.description: Detailed methodology for construction works near trees.

types.name: Tree Condition Report
types.description: Assessment of tree health, structural condition, and safety.

types.name: Tree Safety / Hazard Report
types.description: Focused assessment of tree safety hazards and risk to people/property.

types.name: Mortgage / Insurance Report
types.description: Assessment of trees in relation to property for mortgage/insurance purposes.

types.name: Custom / User-Defined Report
types.description: Template for user-defined custom reports with flexible structure.
